name: Vortex Steam File Downloader
author: Nagev
description: Vortex extension that interacts with Steam's API to query and download files. Can currently be used by users and/or extension developers to trigger a game files verification process that can restore the originals of any damaged/tampered files; Can also download Steam Workshop mods for games that support it.
